评论详情: I absolutely love these pants. They're super comfy and they fit great. I've had them for awhile and I haven't had any problems with them until recently. At one point I was sitting down for class and they ripped from the cross section of the crotch stich and back to the right. I had another pair of pants and was able to sew these up when I got home but when I washed them recently one of the straps ripped clean off and then they ripped again in the opposite direction of the first rip. I do have thick thighs and I deal with problems like this with pants all the time but its a little annoying since I've had other pants that I've had for longer and worn more that have lasted longer than these. I'd definitely recommend these just be careful of how you treat them, the stitching isn't the best.

I've wore these pants only 3 times and the right thigh pocket is ripping at the top, there's a hole in the crotch that's developing, the drawstring holes have ripped open and the straps are ripping at the seams.
The thigh area is so tight. I love the design and the way it feels though. Just wish there was a size bigger
the pants look and feel so good but then you get to the thigh section of the pants. it’s so tight around the thighs and yet so loose/comfortable everywhere else.
I like everything about these pants except that they are not drawstring
Bought these for son and were too small, even though they say they use US sizes and to order in normal size.
